meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #896.

td.p: Bill Gellert, a research associate from Washington, D.C.
Lenny Manning, an accountant originally from Sweden
Robin Carter, a substitute teacher originally from San Antonio, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,401)

tr.td: SCIENCE
AUTHORS
BUSINESS '88
FRUITS
CELEBRITIES
SMART AS A FOX
